about_the_game:
An additional map for use at the Gate menu titled:

“The Beginning of The End” - An additional Map +5 missions. Moderate difficulty.
“The Emissary from the Netherworld” - 5 additional missions. Moderate difficulty.
“Price of Blood” - 5 additional missions. Hard difficulty.
“Runaway Cause and Effect” - 5 additional missions. Expert difficulty.
“Prelude to the Destruction.” - 5 additional missions. Expert difficulty.

Good luck out there!
detailed_description:
An additional map for use at the Gate menu titled:

“The Beginning of The End” - An additional Map +5 missions. Moderate difficulty.

“Price of Blood” - 5 additional missions. Hard difficulty.
“Runaway Cause and Effect” - 5 additional missions. Expert difficulty.
“Prelude to the Destruction.” - 5 additional missions. Expert difficulty.

name: Lost Dimension: Additional Map/Quest Bundle

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Lost Dimension: Additional Map/Quest Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: An additional map for use at the Gate menu titled: “The Beginning of The End”, plus a collection of additional quests for use at the Gate menu including: “The Emissary from the Netherworld”, “Price of Blood”, “Runaway Cause and Effect” and “Prelude to the Destruction.” Good luck out there!
